actions.committee: House Committee on Interstate and Foreign Commerce
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Interstate and Foreign Commerce.

official_title: A bill to amend the Clean Air Act to define the term "useful life of vehicles and engines".

summary.text: Defines, for purposes of the Clean Air Act, the useful life of vehicles and engines in the case of light duty vehicle engines to be a period of use of two years or of 24,000 miles (or the eguivalent), whichever occurs first.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Clean Air Act to define the term "useful life of vehicles and engines".
